The bridge between you and the GPTs you love

A powerful GUI for the OpenAI API. Access 15 AI models with transparent pricing, advanced controls, and complete cost transparency. No subscriptions.

Download for iOS Learn More
iOS Only No Subscriptions 15 AI Models

Built for AI Power Users Who Want Control

Lookinglass serves students, professionals, and developers who are tired of expensive AI subscriptions that limit model choice and hide costs. Whether you're a researcher who needs access to specific OpenAI models, a startup founder managing AI expenses, or a developer building AI-powered applications, Lookinglass puts you in control.

Unlike traditional AI apps that lock you into monthly subscriptions, Lookinglass operates on transparent pay-as-you-go pricing. You choose the exact AI model for each conversation, see costs upfront, and pay only for what you use. No subscription fatigue, no surprise bills, no restrictions on switching between GPT-4, ChatGPT, and O-series models mid-conversation.

Perfect for users who want professional-grade AI access without enterprise-level commitments. From quick GPT-4o queries costing pennies to complex O-model reasoning tasks, Lookinglass scales with your needs while keeping your data private and your costs transparent.

Everything you need for AI conversations

Get more control, transparency, and access to the latest OpenAI models

15 AI Models

Access 10 ChatGPT models and 5 O-models. Switch between models per conversation thread whenever you want.

Transparent Pricing

See exact costs before sending messages. Pay-as-you-go with no subscriptions. Optional Flex pricing saves ~50% if you can wait.

Smart Wallet

Add funds from $1-$500, audit all transactions, and export CSV reports. Built-in cost guard prevents surprise charges.

Advanced Controls

Customize context windows, permanent memory, temperature settings, and effort levels for O-models. Full control over your AI experience.

Privacy First

We don't store your conversations or prompts. Only metadata for billing and operations. Your data stays private.

Voice to Text

Speak your questions naturally with built-in voice-to-text. Perfect for quick queries and hands-free interaction.
